name: Repair Structure
brief: Fix damaged buildings to restore functionality
description: Repair damaged structures within a settlement to restore its capabilities. You must select a structure first, then perform the skill check. Only the lowest tier damaged structure per category can be repaired.

criticalSuccess.description: Citizens volunteer their time and materials. The structure is repaired for free!

failure.description: Despite your efforts, the structure remains damaged and cannot be repaired at this time.

criticalFailure.description: Time and money are wasted in the failed repair attempt. The structure remains damaged.
